text: Lemanu Palepoi Sialegā Mauga (born January 3, 1960) is an American Samoan politician. In 2021, he became the 58th governor of American Samoa. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Mauga served as Senator in the American Samoa Senate, where he became the Chairman of both the Budget and Appropriations Committee and the Senate Homeland Security Committee. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of American Samoa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of American Samoa Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: Lemanu Peleti Mauga
